channel.title: Mark's Prayer Site
channel.description: Recent content on Mark's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: November 23, 2025 Today's Verse Hebrews 4:15 [15] For we do not have a high priest who is unable to sympathize with our weaknesses, but one who in every respect has been tempted as we are, yet without sin. Today's Memory Verse Ephesians 6:12 - For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the cosmic powers over this present darkness, against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places.
